preprocess module

preprocess.preprocess(data_path: str) → DataFrame

Preprocess data for model training.

Parameters:

data_path – path to the data file tracked by DVC

Returns:

dataframe with data preocessed

preprocess.remove_duplicate_lines(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame

Remove duplicate lines in a dataframe.

Parameters:

df – dataframe that has duplicated rows values

Returns:

dataframe without duplicated rows

preprocess.save_parquet(df: DataFrame, data_path: str) → None

Save dataframe in a parquet file.

Parameters:

  • df – data to be saved

  • data_path – path for data save

Returns:
